welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Grosshansdorf, a charming city known for its beautiful scenery and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our quaint streets, sample our delicious cuisine, and immerse yourself in the rich culture of our town. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hamburg Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Hamburg Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration and have limited speed.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lübeck Blankensee Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used primarily for charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
